summary: Frontend testing complete for expanded marketplace with 87 events across 7 categories. All features tested and working correctly: Categories dropdown in Header shows all 7 categories, Events page displays 87 total events, all filters (type=train, f1, attraction, festival, tennis, match, concert) working with correct counts, quick filter buttons functional, and event type badges display with correct icons and colors.
seed_data_creation: Existing 87 events in database across 7 categories: match(20), concert(16), train(17), attraction(12), festival(8), f1(7), tennis(7)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Expanded marketplace fully tested. 87 events across 7 categories (Football, Concerts, Trains, Attractions, Festivals, F1, Tennis). All filters and quick filter buttons working correctly. Categories dropdown in Header shows all 7 categories with proper icons and colors.
passed_tests: Events page displays total of 87 events
Categories dropdown in Header shows all 7 categories (Football, Concerts, Trains, Attractions, Festivals, Formula 1, Tennis)
Type filter dropdown on Events page shows all 7 type options
Filter by type=train shows 17 trains
Filter by type=f1 shows 7 F1 races
Filter by type=attraction shows 12 attractions
Filter by type=festival shows 8 festivals
Filter by type=tennis shows 7 tennis events
Filter by type=match shows 20 football matches
Filter by type=concert shows 16 concerts
Quick filter button 'Football' works correctly (20 events)
Quick filter button 'Concerts' works correctly (16 events)
Quick filter button 'Trains' works correctly (17 events)
Quick filter button 'Attractions' works correctly (12 events)
Quick filter button 'Festivals' works correctly (8 events)
Quick filter button 'F1' works correctly (7 events)
Quick filter button 'Tennis' works correctly (7 events)
URL updates with correct type parameter when filter is applied
Clear filters button works correctly
Event type badges display with correct icons and colors (Train=blue, Football=emerald, Concert=purple, F1=red, Attraction=amber, Festival=pink, Tennis=green)
